info_en: From Niagara Falls, Canada, Jesse Williams (also known as fast idio), brings us a lush idm track called "he made me eat grass" mixing crunchy beats with a japanese koto driven melody. This track was originally released in September 2002 as a standalone track and then later re-released under our current catalogue numbering. Re-released in 2012 with updated cover artwork by Dina Barbosa.

info_en:
Though Kevin Krebs often describes himself proverbially, he is a seminal influence in the Netlabel scene and has created many important works using original source material of the eclectic and electroacoustic variety. Mystified, aka Thomas Park, remains a prolific artist who specializes in creating songs and audio collages from sounds he finds at his Saint Louis apartment or from surrounding neighborhoods.

"Reclaiming The Darkness" involved a sample exchange-- across the Pacific Ocean, unique and home-crafted sounds travelled as tiny bits, to be retrieved at other shores. Several pieces were written by each artist as "solo" pieces, and one piece, "Blinded", was written by simply agreeing on a track length, and mixing two signals, one from each artist, without preview. The result is a strange and enjoyable journey that emphasizes the strengths of both artists!

Kevin Krebs and mystified would like to thank Sandy Spreitz for the fine cover art!
info_pt: Album ambiental colaborativo entre os projectos Kevin Krebs e Mystified. Grafismo por Sandy Spreitz.

info_en: etcetera music is an alternative musical project born in 2005 which tries to find an original way of expression in sound art. Origins of the pig is their newest ep, featuring three recent sonic experiments.

info_en: Reknown Lithuanian artist, composer and performer Antanas Jasenka explores many different areas of music from acoustic music, theatre and movie music, to advance experimental, conceptual art, electronic music. Point.exe is a work done with max/msp exploiting the sphere and spectrum of digitally produced sounds, an attempt to take a closer look at the old patterns from today's perspective. Artwork by Dmitriy Krotevich added in November 2013.
info_pt: EP de electronica experimental no campo do microsound espacial, pelas mãos do projecto Lituano Antanas Jasenka. Grafismo por Dmitriy Krotevich adicionado em Novembro de 2013.

You can hear more of his work at his myspace site.

info_en: This release is the first release under the moniker Extrapool but Phillip Spradley has done other releases as "human" on ivdt years back. all his other releases thus far were handmade, extremely limited ones. the name extrapool, and the music made is sort of a reflection on everything that clogs human existance. things commonly associated to "living" that have nothing to do with "surviving". in one sense the work is completely conceptual and another it's satirical. the sound itself is not fixed and ranges from noise and found samples to glitch and breakcore (sort of). influences are mainly first wave industrial, back when the sound was raw and non-conforming (throbbing gristle, whitehouse, einsturzende neubatan, laibach), as well as current more rhythmatic idm artists (richard devine, xanopticon).
info_pt: Edição de noise industrial pelas mãos do projecto extrapool, oriundo dos Estados Unidos.

info_en: You might have heard of soundZcapa by his releases netlabels farfromshowbiz, bennekea and feketepont. His debut on enough is a smooth, sleepy and mostly calm 5 track ep called "merge of two unlike sleeps". Trying to represent the potential metaphysical contact between dreams of two people sleepin' in the same bed. The tracks made by improvisations on keyboard and drummachines on a lazy summer-end week.
info_pt: EP de ambiental calminho, representando o contacto potencialmente metafísico entre os sonhos de duas pessoas a dormir na mesma cama, pelas mãos do projecto Hungaro soundZcapa.

info_en: Contemporary experimental written by sound artist Roberto Maldoror Manfredini contacted us trying to re-release under our netlabel some of his previously limited edition creations put out through a now defunct local label. This album was one of the first we listened to and imediatly adored, both for it's concept and the sounds derived from it, it's a love tribute to the great Yukio Mishima, even if the title it's kind of... satyrical (the translation could be "Mishima's first rat's fuck", based on the book "Confession of a mask", where he describes his first masturbation on the image of Saint Sebastian).
info_pt: Re-edição de um album do Italiano Roberto Maldoror Manfredini, previamente editado em edição limitada. Tributo spoken word ao trabalho de Yukio Mishima.

info_en: Album from Russian project Technology of Silence - ambient / industrial / experimental, existing since 2004. Technology of Silence is a story about City, outlived ecological catastrophe, hypertrophied Chernobyl, is a story about people, which lives in this City, is a story about ecological catastrophe, about human psychosis, human fears and about eternal searching for in loneless. this is their second album, the first (recorded in 2004) having been released in Polish and Russian labels in spring 2007.

Plus a musicdisk version for the Playstation Portable with coding courtesy of Titan and graphic animations provided by Raquel Meyers. web browser version and iOS version also available.

info_en: Tamara and Demon album is the soundtrack of the 3D cartoon of the same name, created By Nikolay Aladinskiy and Petr Bobryshev - StPetersburg, Russia. Muhmood - is a one man act and the stage name of Alexei Biryukoff - a Siberian artist, who makes conceptual projects that include large scale figurative paintngs, perfomances, installations and sound. Muhmood's music is a mixture of all kinds of styles, starting from a capellas, going thru experimental dark ambient with an ethnic streak [mostly middle eastern] and creative percussion, ending with heavy guitar riffs and powerful drum sets.

info_pt: Compilação de projectos Portugueses activos em 2008 em géneros arredores ao industrial. Fortemente inspirada pela associação industrialpt. Edição fisica em digipack limitada a 500 copias co-editada pela Thisco Records em inicios de 2009. Projectos participantes incluem Z.O.T.E., ps vs Sektor 304, Waste Disposal Machine, Control Alt Deus, aktiv[E|H]ate, 1N.C1.D3.N7, Sci-Fi Industries, Kronos, Violet And The Mutants, Mikroben Krieg, Structura, Stuka, DSM666, U.M.M. e Oocito II. Grafismo por André Coelho.

info_en: Debut release of Australian Matt Preston under his indie surf pop electronic project called I vs. Nature.
info_pt: Album de indie surf pop electronica do Australiano Matt Preston com o seu projecto I vs. Nature.

info_en: Harsh Electro EP by Portuguese duo Control Alt Deus, originally distributed at the Lock The Target festival, now also freely available for download.
info_pt: EP de hellektro do duo Português Control Alt Deus.

info_en: Debut release of Hungarian project Bashed Nursling, 5 tracks of dark, raw and extremly harsh techno industrial noise.
info_pt: Album de techno noise industrial extremamente agressivo pelo projecto Hungaro Bashed Nursling.

info_en: New release by previous enough artist (morse) with a full album of space ambient. "Soon after the first contact between our home planet and a distant planet, a global secret organization was formed to attempt to keep the public knowledge of these contacts to a minimum. The organization was quickly uncovered following the first attack on our home planet and the organization quickly lost public trust and support. In an attempt to gain the public's trust, the organization allowed one civilian to give reports on the organizations actions. To maintain some secrecy, and protect the reporter's identity, the reports were put out under the name...(morse)"
info_pt: Album de ambiental cinemático e espacial pelas mãos do projecto Americano (morse).

info_en: Jenifer Ávila is a Spanish indie pop duo. This is their debut demo, 8 tracks of some laidback spring afternoon tracks to lift your soul away.
info_pt: Demo EP de indie pop refrescante pelo duo Espanhol Jenifer Ávila.

info_en: Previous enough release artist ISK brings us an 8 track ep of another of his projects of harsh electro industrial aktivehate. Closing a chapter before driving the project more into a slightly different style. Features a bonus tribute track to fellow Portuguese hellektro act Control Alt Deus who split up shortly after their two releases at enough.
info_pt: EP de harsh electro industrial pelas mãos do projecto Português aktivehate.

info_en: 6 tracks of laidback electronica from London's Project 5am.
info_pt: 6 temas de electrónica relaxante do projecto Londrino Project 5am.

info_en: Experimental ambient (with field recordings) album by Lisbon resident Jorge Nunes who also recently released at fellow portuguese netlabel XS Records and is more known for his work under the anakedlunch collective.
info_pt: Album de ambiencias experimentais feitas com field recordings pelo Lisboense Jorge Nunes, mais reconhecido pelo seu trabalho com o colectivo anakedlunch.

info_en: To celebrate our 200th non compilation release we bring you this special bootleg recorded by Sir Garbage Truck, of an experimental hardcore ambient jam session form our staff member ps and our Serbian friends from kosmoplovci under their moniker kdes. Big thanks to Nosfe who arranged for us to play in that art gallery somewhere in the middle of Helsinki. Sorry to the person whose sound system we managed to slightly destroy, and thanks to everyone who we met during that week, we have good memories.
info_pt: Gravação de um concerto de improv hardcore experimental ambient tocado em Helsinkia entre ps e o colectivo Sérbio kdes / kosmoplovci.

info_en: EBM album dating back to 2004, from previous mexican enough releaser Victor Valdez.
info_pt: Album de EBM originalmente produzido em 2004 pelo Mexicano Victor Valdez, desta feita com o pseudónimo Ghost Recon.

info_en: Small ep of field recordings by Portuguese Luís Antero which previously released on other netlabels such as the Chinese Bypass and the Portuguese Electro Rucini, with photograph artwork by João Nora.
info_pt: EP de captações sonoras do Português Luís Antero.

info_en:
Proyecto de Prueba is an ambient project, with some elements taken from drone and concrete music. Goat and Raven had their own thoughts about antimatter while praising the dronelords in the city of Córdoba, Argentina, when in some obscure night of the year 2008 AD, they decided to release their first demo. It was untitled, but the fanbase call it "7", because of a strange stain on the upper right corner of the cover art. A split with Void>Null was released on February, 2009. In this album, we can feel how they have moved to a more traditional ambient sound, but keeping some sources from concrete music.

Void>Null was a drone doom tribute band. Their main and only influences were Sunn O))) and Stephen O'Malley. On 2007, they released a 3-tracks album, Al�beta B�toriov�-N�dasdy. Later, in 2008, the vocalist of the band, Lambda Nulli, passed away, so Corvus Mellori, the other member, decided that Void>Null shouldn't exist any more as an active music entity. Anyways, he had a couple of unreleased tracks, so here we have some of them: another version of Bathory Erzsebet and Striborgian, a totally unheard song.
info_pt: Split de sons doom / drone ambientais entre dois projectos da Argentina: Proyecto de Prueba e Void>Null.

info_en: Alterior is an experimental IDM project - with some influences of breakcore and videogame music - from New Jersey in the United States. Here with a special version for enoughrecords of his no reason to be ashamed album also available for purchase at cdbaby.
info_pt: Re-edição online do album de IDM experimental, com influencias de breakcore e musica de videojogos. Projecto oriundo de Nova Jérsia com o nome de alterior.

artist: The Vanhalia Project / The Sundog Project
album: The Vanhalia Project / The Sundog Project
info_en: Self-titled electronic ambient split release between two projects: The Vanhalia Project from Italian Giovanni Alibrandi and The Sundog Project from British Ian Johnson. Photograph cover artwork used with permission from Dallas Photoworks.
info_pt: Split de electronica ambiental entre dois projectos: The Vanhalia Project do Italiano Giovanni Alibrandi, e The Sundog Project do Britânico Ian Johnson. Fotografia cortesia de Dallas Photoworks.

info_en: In a STFU Porto 2009 aftermath, here is a recording of the space ambient set from our local portuguese friend ocp. He has recently also been recently releasing under his own netlabel EdP.
info_pt: Gravação do set do concerto tocado no STFU Porto 2009, sons ambientais espaciais pelas mãos do Portuense ocp, patrão da recentemente fundada netlabel EdP.

info_en: 4 track debut release ep of Portuguese darkwave / electronic project In[Perfektion], 5 years after the original demo cdr self-release, we are proud to bring you this remastered high quality version as part of the countdown for their upcoming album "Vultures Among Us", available through Hesperus Records.
info_pt: Re-edição re-masterizada de um EP originalmente editado em cdr edição limitada pelo projecto de darkwave / futurepop Português In[Perfektion]. Parte da contagem decrescente para o lançamento do seu novo album "Vultures Among Us", disponivel através da Hesperus Records.

info_en: Morally incorrect noise split ep between two projects: Polish Animal Machine and Russian Earth Incubator. Artwork by André Coelho.
info_pt: Split de noise moralmente incorrecto entre dois projectos: o Polaco Animal Machine e o Russo Earth Incubator. Grafismo por André Coelho.

album: Realm of the New Day - The Remixes
info_en: Remixes album from Thisco legend Sci Fi Industries. 12 tracks of electronic music remixes and colaborations of Luis Van Seixas with many different projects between 1997 and 2008.
info_pt: Album de remisturas e colaborações com vários projectos entre 1997 e 2008, todos da autoria de Luis Van Seixas e o seu projecto de electronica Sci Fi Industries.

info_en: Dark ambient release from our portuguese friend Pedro Vieira under his solo project Eletrólise.
info_pt: Album de dark ambient pelo Português Pedro Vieira com o seu projecto a solo Eletrólise.

info_en: Dark ambient glitch ep by Dyman, delivering here some very different kind of sounds than the triphop laidback beats released at his debut in enoughrecords and his latest album at fellow portuguese netlabel Abutre under his other moniker DMN Productions.
info_pt: Album de dark ambient glitch pelo projecto Português Dyman.

info_en: Return of our dark ambient release artist Infetu with a short EP of salvaged tracks originally aimed for a longer album release, which got canceled due to destroyed studio. If you like his work as much as we do, please go to his artist webpage and donate something to help him rebuild his studio.
info_pt: EP de dark ambient pelo projecto Americano Infetu. Temas recuperados de um estúdio destruido enquanto produzia o novo album de longa duração que se perdeu.

info_en: 7 track dark electro / ebm EP originally released back in 2006 by Portuguese darkwave / electronic project In[Perfektion] (featuring a remix by ESC) now remastered and available free for download as part of the countdown to their upcoming album "Vultures Among Us", available through Hesperus Records.
info_pt: Re-edição re-masterizada de um EP originalmente editado em cdr edição limitada pelo projecto de darkwave / futurepop Português In[Perfektion]. Parte da contagem decrescente para o lançamento do seu novo album "Vultures Among Us", disponivel pela Hesperus Records.

info_en: Russian project Open Work Stocking delivers us a new ambient IDM ep. If you like his sounds as much as we do, please also consider getting his latest CD album "Diademia", recently made available at Fluttery Records.
info_pt: EP de IDM ambiental pelo projecto Russo Open Work Stocking, recentemente editou o seu album "Diademia" pela Fluttery Records.

info_en: New album of indie experimental rock, with a touch of psychedelic by Spanish group Sugar Overdose.
info_pt: Album de rock indie experimental pelo grupo Espanhol Sugar Overdose.

info_en: An EP collaboration of two Siberian artists - Виктор Iванiв (Victor Ivaniv) is a futurist poet from Novosibirsk. Muhmood is Alexei Biryukoff's one man project from Barnaul, experimenting with ambient soundscapes, noises, field recordings and heavy guitar music. They met in November 2007 when Victor came to Barnaul with a presentation of his book "A Glass Man and the Green Record". At that time they decided to try to do 2 or 3 tracks to see what would come out. By June 2009 the four tracks EP is done. They continue to work on a long playing album that will include Victor's poems and prose.
info_pt: EP de dark ambient com spoken word, trabalho colaborativo entre dois residentes da Sibéria, o poeta Victor Ivaniv e o músico Alexei Biryuoff. Pequeno preview do album que se avizinha.

info_en: 4 track post-rock ep from Portuguese Renato Martinho under his brainchild project Nagra.
info_pt: EP de pós rock Portugês pelas mãos de Renato Martinho com o seu projecto Nagra.

info_en: 5 track dark electro EP originally released back in 2007 by Portuguese project In[Perfektion] now remastered and available free for download as part of the countdown to their upcoming album "Vultures Among Us", soon available at Hesperus Records.

Split edition between Palaeolithic Doom band Josué, o Salvador em Busca da Perdição and the slow placed sonic behemoth named Profan.

Both bands present one track each, consisting in almost 40 minutes of material of the finest doom, sludge and ambient music made in Portugal. Artwork by André Coelho

This edition is also available in limited edition copies of 50 CDR (self-released, currently available at Louie Louie and Lost Underground in Porto) and 100 K7 (released in colaboration with Bubonic Records). Get your copy!
info_pt:

A edição está também disponivel em edições físicas de 50 CDr (edição de autor, cópias disponivéis por email ou fisicamente na Louie Louie e Lost Underground no Porto) e 100 K7 (em colaboração com Bubonic Records).

info_en:
5 track EP of portuguese guitar sounds blended with electronics, produced almost entirely with an iPod and free tools from the apple app store, by the portuguese project M-PeX.

Physical edition of this EP is also available for purchase at FNAC stores in Portugal, or by direct order from the author by email.

Following the hiatus since the highly acclaimed debut release of "Phado", this EP serves as build-up to a new album to be released in the coming months, we hope you enjoy this release, and if you like it as much as we do please remember to support the artist. Artwork by Marco Madruga. Photograph by Marco Ramos.
info_pt:
EP de 5 temas de guitarra portuguesa misturada com electronica, gravada quase inteiramente com um iPod e ferramentas gratuitas disponiveis na loja de aplicativos da Apple, produzido pelas mãos do projecto Português M-PeX.

Edição física deste EP também se encontra à venda nas lojas FNAC, ou pode ser encomendado directamente ao autor por email.

Este EP surge como entrada a um novo album que estará disponivel dentro de alguns meses, no seguimento da edição do bem aclamado album de estreia "Phado". Esperamos que gostem desta edição, se gostarem dela por favor considerem apoiar o artista. Grafismo por Marco Madruga. Fotografia por Marco Ramos.

info_en: Latest album by UK project amitron_7. Laidback psychedelic ambient with a touch of jazz and plenty of vintage sampling.

info_en:
Double album of classic piano style jazz compositions by Jared C. Balogh flowing between different states of introspection, anxiety and acceptance. 2 volumes of Balogh's "Seasons" series.

"Chaotic-Life-Fin" is a compilation of 9 songs from volume 1 of the "Seasons" series. It is a piano based album that has a contemporary jazz and classical feel. It presents a strong emotion of passions in finding true love, finding your place in the world, lifting yourself up through tough times, releasing internal problems free to being healing, and personal resolutions.

"Revitalized Eyes" has spurts of jazz like moments but is mainly a compilation of the more avant garde, contemporary and experimental classical style songs written in volume 1 of the series "Seasons". It is a 10 song album that takes the listener on an invigorating journey of great emotions.
info_pt:
Album duplo de composições de jazz maioritariamente em estilo piano clássico pelas mãos de Jared C. Balogh. 2 volumes que fluem entre diferentes estados de introspeção, ansiedade e aceitação. Ambos fazem parte da série "Seasons" do autor.

"Chaotic-Life-Fin" é uma compilação de 9 temas do primeiro volume da série "Seasons". É um album baseado em piano com um toque de jazz contemporâneo e piano clássico. Apresenta fortes emoções de encontrar um amor verdadeiro, encontrar o nosso lugar no mundo, ganhar coragem para ultrapassar tempos dificeis, libertação de problemas internos para permitir a cura e resolução interna.

"Revitalized Eyes" tem algumas fugas para momentos de jazz mas é maioritariamente uma compilação mais avant garde, contemporânea e experimental dentro do estilo clássico. É um album de 10 temas que transporta o ouvinte através de diversas emoções.

info_en: New mashup album by one member of Varia, you might remember them from their previous release at Enough Records, a double album titled Magic + Omega. It's quite hard to define their style in writing, a remix / mashup sonic soup of sorts using 70s and 80s classics in post new wave / disco / electro fashion mixed with some occasional movie or audiobook sampling.
info_pt: Novo album de mashups pelas mãos de um dos membros do grupo Varia, o nome poderá soar familiar, eles lançaram um duplo album pela Enough Records entitulado Magic + Omega. É bastante dificil definir o estilo dos Varia por escrito, uma espécia de sopa sónica de remisturas e mashups usando como base clássicos dos anos 70 e 80, e reapropriando-os num estilo post new wave / disco / electro / rock, com alguns samples de filmes e audiobooks atirados ao barulho.

info_en: Impromeeting is a meeting place for the improvisation of sound artists from different artistic disciplines as a form of collaboration, experimentation and fun. Impromeeting accommodates musicians and non-musicians, narrators, poets, electronics, sound art, djing, turntablism or any other form of creating sound and noise from the point of view of experimental music. Organised by Mauri (producer, artist and dj). First edition was in 2010 and the second edition was on 10th of july 2011 in Gijón (Spain) with 4 artists from different musical styles (were first improvising in pairs, and ended up playing all together). The artists for Impromeetin 2011 were: Non Ergo (with a computer, synthesizer, and voice). Vred (electronic violoncelo, guitar, contrabass and some footswitch). Violeta Nureyev (bass and voice). Las Casi Casiotone (with 2 MacBook Pro, Midi controller, delay footswitch and microphone).
info_pt: Impromeeting é um local de improvisação de artistas sonoros de diferentes disciplinas artisticas como uma forma de colaboração, experimentação e divertimento. Impromeeting junta musicos e não-musicos, narradores, poetas, electronicas, sound art, djing, turntablism ou qualquer outra forma de criação sonora ou noise do ponto de vista de musica experimental. Organizado por Mauri (produtor, artista e dj). Primeira edição foi em 2010 e a segunda no dia 10 de Julho de 2011 em Gijón (Espanha) com 4 artistas de diferentes estilos musicais (primeiro a improvisar em pares, depois a tocarem todos juntos). Or artistas participatnes no Impromeeting'2011 foram: Non Ergo (com computador, sintetizador, e voz). Vred (violencelo electronico, guitarra, contrabaixo e alguns pedais). Violeta Nureyev (baixo e voz). Las Casi Casiotone (com 2 MacBook Pro, controlador Midi, pedal de delay e microfone).

info_en:
"Dance it, Dance all" is the 10th Easton Ellises creative commons single.

To mark the occasion, the band launched a successful 30 day fan funding (a.k.a. crowd funding) campaign in order to collect the funds necessary to press a vinyl record.

A producer pack was put up on the web for artists to remix and submit their own versions of the song. The response was phenomenal and "Dance it, Dance all" remixes were submitted from all over the world. Due to the limited amount of play time available on a vinyl record, only the original version, a Motel Costes Mix and the bands 6 favourite remixes were pressed onto the record and officially released in Montreal, Canada on May 17th 2012.

Included in this "Dance it, Dance all" release are the 12 cuts that the band really wanted to press on the record.
info_pt:
"Dance it, Dance all" é o décimo single editado pelos The Easton Ellises sob licença creative commons.

Para marcar a ocasião, a banda lançou com sucesso uma campanha de angariação de fundos para imprimir um disco em vinil.

Um pack de produtor foi disponibilizado online para artistas remisturarem e submeterem as suas versões, a resposta foi fenomenal com remisturas oriundas dos quatro cantos do mundo. Devido ao limite do vinil somente 6 remisturas acompanharam o single em vinil, lançado oficialmente em Montreal, Canada no dia 17 de Maio de 2012.

Incluidas nesta edição online do "Dance it, Dance all" encontram-se as 12 faixas que a banda queria realmente imprimir.

info_en: Mixing electronics with the sounds of the Portuguese guitar might seem odd at first but Portuguese project M-PeX has been mastering it for a couple of years with great public acclaim. His latest release is in the shape of an EP titled Ignis, and brings us 5 tracks with a scent of dubstep surrounding the theme of the ancient theory of the platonic solids. The physical release is also available at Portuguese FNAC stores or can be ordered directly from the author by email.
info_pt: A mistura de música electrónica com o som da guitarra Portuguesa pode parecer curioso à primeira escuta mas o projecto Português M-PeX tem-se vindo a especializar nesta fusão com grande sucesso. O seu trabalho mais recente vem no formato de um EP de seu nome Ignis e contem 5 temas com um cheirinho a dubstep. O tema à volta do EP relaciona-se com a teoria ancestral dos sólidos platónicos e pode ser escutado gratuitamente na Enough, comprado nas lojas FNAC de Portugal ou encomendado por email ao autor.

info_en: Electronica album by Portuguese project Sci Fi Industries. Originally released as a limited edition under Thisco in 2008 now available free for download at Enough Records! Artwork by André Coelho.
info_pt: Album de electronica pelas mãos do projecto Português Sci Fi Industries. Originalmente lançado como edição limitada pela Thisco em 2008, agora disponivel para download gratuito através da Enough Records! Grafismo por André Coelho.

info_en: 4 is the 4th album from the Portuguese psychedelic jazz rock noise project dUAS sEMIcOLCHEIAS iNVERTIDAS (dSCi). Titled after the self-titled 4th albums of other notorious bands, this album is now made available free for download to celebrating the end of their kebab tour 2012 while the band is still making their way back to Portugal crossing through Spain, France and Italy.
info_pt: 4 é o quarto album do projecto Português de jazz psicadélico rock noise dUAS sEMIcOLCHEIAS iNVERTIDAS (dSCi). Titulado segundo outros quartos albums de bandas notórias, este album encontra-se agora disponivel para download gratuito celebrando o final da kebab tour 2012 enquanto a banda retorna a Portugal, ainda com concertos marcados Espanha, França e Itália.

info_en: Live bootleg of Finnish project Nega live at the Latvian Noise festival Kuucvaals in 2011. Performing a set bridging from experimental ambient to powernoize and spoken word. The quality of the recording is a bit dodgy but good enough to feel the experience if you play it on a proper sound system. A couple links on youtube [1] [2]
info_pt: Gravação da performance do projecto Filândes Nega ao vivo na edição de 2011 do festival de noise letão Kuucvaals. O set varia entre a electronica ambiental experimental, o powernoize e o spoken word. A qualidade da gravação não é a melhor, mas suficiente para se sentir a experiência do projecto ao vivo. Links da performance no youtube [1] [2]

info_en: Mixtape of original IDM tracks by Portuguese project likeicare, showcasing some of his work through the last production year. Most of tracks having already been released through other netlabels, here they are mixed down in 20 minutes of likeicare.
info_pt: Mixtape de temas de música IDM da autoria do projecto Português likeicare. A maioria dos temas já tendo sido previamente editados noutras netlabels, nesta release encontram-se misturadas em 20 minutos que ilustram bem a qualidade do trabalho de likeicare.

album: 100 Years of Noise - Public Domain Celebration Release
info_en:
Compilation celebrating the 100th anniversary of 'L'Arte dei Rumori', the first artistic manifesto concerning noise music. It was written by Luigi Russolo, an Italian futurist painter and composer, who was interested in classifying all the new sounds that were coming out from the machines at the time.

The tracks on this compilation are not about white noise, they cover all spectrum of experimental sounds: music concréte, electro acoustic, free jazz, circuit bending, field recordings, etc.

This compilation was released on January 1st, the Public Domain Day under public domain licenses.

You can find additional information and tracks about the project at the projects website.
info_pt:
Compilação que celebra o centenário da edição do 'L'Arte dei Rumori', o primeiro manifesto artistico sobre música noise, escrito por Luigi Russolo, um pintor e compositor futurista Italiano que se interessou pela classificação de todos os novos tipos de sons produzidos por máquinas na altura.

Os temas desta compilação não se focam no noise puro, cobrem todo o espectro de sonoridades experimentais: música concreta, electro acústico, free jazz, circuit bending, gravações de campo, etc.

Esta compilação foi editada dia 1 de Janeiro, em co-celebração do dia dedicado às licensas de dominio público.

Mais informação e submissões adicionais sobre o projecto podem ser encontradas na respectiva página web.

info_en: Album by Portuguese project M-PeX in collaboration with Makrox. Mixing Portuguese guitar with electronics, jazz and hiphop elements. World music at it's best. Artwork by Marco Madruga.
info_pt: Album do projecto Português M-PeX em colaboração com Makrox. Misturando guitarra portuguesa com electrónica e elementos de jazz e hiphop. Música do mundo no seu melhor. Grafismo por Marco Madruga.

info_en:
Compilation celebrating the 100th anniversary of 'L'Arte dei Rumori', the first artistic manifesto concerning noise music. It was written by Luigi Russolo, an Italian futurist painter and composer, who was interested in classifying all the new sounds that were coming out from the machines at the time.

The tracks on this compilation are not about white noise, they cover all spectrum of experimental sounds: music concrète, electro acoustic, free jazz, circuit bending, field recordings, etc.

This compilation is the final version of enrcmp18, featuring 11 additional tracks from artists that either prefered not having their tracks licensed as public domain or were not delivered in time.

You can find additional information and tracks about the project at the projects website.
info_pt:
Compilação que celebra o centenário da edição do 'L'Arte dei Rumori', o primeiro manifesto artistico sobre música noise, escrito por Luigi Russolo, um pintor e compositor futurista Italiano que se interessou pela classificação de todos os novos tipos de sons produzidos por máquinas na altura.

Os temas desta compilação não se focam no noise puro, cobrem todo o espectro de sonoridades experimentais: música concreta, electro acústico, free jazz, circuit bending, gravações de campo, etc.

Esta compilação é uma versão final da enrcmp19, com 11 temas de projectos que ou não quiseram os seus temas editados em dominio público ou não entregaram a tempo.

Informações adicionais sobre o projecto podem ser encontradas na respectiva página web.

info_en: Follow up compilation of experimental electronic tracks from artists out of Portugal and the North America. The theme of the compilation is crossing the Atlantic ocean. Organized and co-released by Thisco Records. Features tracks by Mantrakid, ocp, Oxford Icebergs, Human Being, Sci Fi Industries, Infetu, ps, Dyman, Com. Gen., shhh..., Waste Disposal Machine, Undara, Mystified and AVOIDANT. Artwork by American painter Ariel Claborn.
info_pt: Segunda compilação de electrónica experimental com temas de artistas de Portugal e da América do Norte sobre o tema da travessia do oceano atlântico. Organizada e co-editada em colaboração com a Thisco Records. Inclui temas de Mantrakid, ocp, Oxford Icebergs, Human Being, Sci Fi Industries, Infetu, ps, Dyman, Com. Gen., shhh..., Waste Disposal Machine, Undara, Mystified e AVOIDANT. Grafismo da capa retirado de uma obra da pintora Americana Ariel Claborn.

info_en: Split of minimalistic dronescapes by Emerge and Sustained Development, being the members of both projects the guys behind the Attenuation Circuit label. Both tracks in this EP are based on guitar sounds by Jesus Jackson.
info_pt: Split de sons drone minimalistas pelas mãos dos projectos Emerge e Sustained Development cujos membros são ambos curadores da editora Attenuation Circuit. Os temas deste EP são baseados em sons de guitarra de Jesus Jackson.

info_en: NoiseTrade Special Enough Records sampler featuring tracks from Daizy, M-Pex & Makrox, 1in10/Varia, Dmitriy Krotevich, dUASsEMICcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS, Dyman, The Easton Ellises with Violet & The Mutants, Gosprom and Jenifer Avila.
info_pt: NoiseTrade Special Enough Records sampler com temas de Daizy, M-Pex & Makrox, 1in10/Varia, Dmitriy Krotevich, dUASsEMICcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS, Dyman, The Easton Ellises, Violet & The Mutants, Gosprom e Jenifer Avila.

info_en: Experimental electronic jazz double album by the hands of Janne Nummela, poet and painter. The title references to The Kalevala, the Finnish work of epic poetry.
info_pt: Duplo album de jazz electrónico experimental pelas mãos do Filandês Janne Nummela, também poeta e pintor. O título faz referência à Kalevala, a epopeia nacional Finlandesa.

info_en: Celestial ambient drone album by Jari Pitkänen with some Italian influences.
info_pt: Album de drone ambiental Jari Pitkänen com influências do Italo disco.

info_en: Concept album by an unknown artist, remixing rock classics and mashing them up with samples on the topic of mind control, power over masses and independent thinking. Part of our Anonymous Archives sub-label.
info_pt: Album conceptual pelas mãos de um artista desconhecido, remisturando clássicos do rock com samples sobre os tópicos de controlo da mente, poder sobre as massas e pensamento independente. Parte do catálogo da nossa sub-editora Anonymous Archives.

info_en: New therapeutic release from our usual suspects dSCi, here presented live in their drummer-less form exploring experimental electronics at Auditório Carlos Paredes during the celebrations for Open Document day earlier this year (27/03/2013). This release also signals the liftoff of the Zaratak tour through Spain and beyond.
info_pt: Nova incursão terapêutica pelos nossos suspeitos do costume dSCi, aqui na sua forma sem bateria experimentando com electrónicas ao vivo no Auditório Carlos Paredes durante o dia da celebração da documentação aberta (27/03/2013). Esta edição marca o inicio da Zaratak tour por terras Espanholas.

info_en: Debut release of Portuguese industrial electronics project Agnosept by Chris Fussion (Vladimir Pavlov) who is recently collaborating with folks from other reknown projects in the Portuguese electro industrial scene such as Aktivehate, Inperfektion and ESC.
info_pt: Estreia do projecto Português de música electrónica industrial Agnosept, pelas mãos de Chris Fussion (Vladimir Pavlov), que tem colaborado recentemente com membros de outros projectos de renome no panorama da música industrial Portuguesa como Aktivehate, Inperfektion e ESC.

info_en: Portuguese industrial post-cyberpunk project kokori delivers us here an EP compiling a set of instrumental geek shaman electronic burlesque sounds with some sampling of local political activism.
info_pt: O projecto Português de música industrial pós-cyberpunk kokori lança aqui um EP compilando um conjunto de temas instrumentais, com uma forte veia geek shamânica e electrónica burlesca com alguma samplagem e influência de activismo político local.

info_en: Electronic album by the hands of German project Th.e n.d. Cover photograph by Mati Faane.
info_pt: Album de electronica pelas mãos do projecto Alemão Th.e n.d. Fotografia por Mati Faane.

info_en: A prequel to Anima Ombra, Siam Soul blends lost sounds from 70s and 80s into an uplifting mashup album, reminiscent of positive memories from our glory teenage summer days.
info_pt: Precedente ao Anima Ombra, Siam Soul mistura sons perdidos dos anos 70 e 80 num album de mashups, reminescente das memórias positivas dos tempos áureos de verão da nossa juventude.

info_en: Electronic album by Spanish project Chuzausen. Artwork by Anna Katarina.
info_pt: Album de electronica pelas mãos do projecto Espanhol Chuzausen. Grafismo por Anna Katarina.

info_en: Centuries ago a pirate ship sank in the Pacific Ocean. Three days after the shipwreck the only confirmed survivor was found recently married to a local dancer in the Caribbean Islands. Composed by rolemusic using LSDJ and rendered in bgb emulator. Artwork by Love Through Cannibalism.
info_pt: Séculos atrás, um navio pirata afundou-se no oceano pacifico. Três dias depois do ocorrido o único sobrevivente confirmado foi encontrado nas Caraibas recentemente casado com uma bailarina local. Música composta por rolemusic utilizando LSDJ and capturada no emulador bgb. Grafismo por Love Through Cannibalism.

info_en: Debut EP of Gottfried Ist Tot, a project by Portuguese Jacquin. Mixing triphop sounds with dark folk influences. Artwork by Jacquin. Final mastering by M-PeX.
info_pt: Debut do Projecto Português Gottfried Ist Tot de Jacquin. Misturando sons de triphop com influências de dark folk. Grafismo por Jacquin. Sugestão de edição e masterização final de M-PeX.

info_en: Stress.fm Special eclectic mixtape featuring tracks from dUASsEMICcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS, M-Pex, Gottfried Ist Tot, Th.e n.d, Daizy, Agnosept, Chuzausen, Inperfektion, Waste Disposal Machine, Sci-Fi Industries, The Easton Ellises, Janne Nummela and 1in10/Varia.
info_pt: Sampler ecléctico especial para a Stress.fm com temas de dUASsEMICcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS, M-Pex, Gottfried Ist Tot, Th.e n.d, Daizy, Agnosept, Chuzausen, Inperfektion, Waste Disposal Machine, Sci-Fi Industries, The Easton Ellises, Janne Nummela and 1in10/Varia.

info_en: Follow up album of classical piano jazz by Jared C. Balogh, closing the trilogy from the 2011 double album release Chaotic-Life-Fin / Revitalized Eyes.
info_pt: Album de jazz classico, Jared C. Balogh no piano, fechando a trilogia iniciada em 2011 com o lançamento do album duplo Chaotic-Life-Fin / Revitalized Eyes.

info_en: Electronic world music EP with influences from nu-jazz and hiphop, mixing Portuguese Guitar with electronics. Produced by Portuguese project M-PeX, in this EP collaborating with André Coelho on bass and DJ X-Acto. Artwork by Marco Madruga.
info_pt: EP de música electrónica misturando a guitarra portuguesa com influências de música do mundo, nu-jazz e hip-hop. Produzido pelo projecto Português M-PeX, em colaboração com André Coelho no baixo e DJ X-Acto. Grafismo por Marco Madruga.

info_en: Portuguese breakcore project .crk returns with one more EP off the chart filled with insane beats and breaks and soothing counterbalancing melodies.
info_pt: .crk, projecto Português de breakcore regressa às edições com mais um EP cheio de batidas e ritmos percursivos acima do limite aconselhado contrabalançado com melodias suaves. Não aconselhado a meninos.

info_en: Special broadcast on Enough Records at the frei² radio show, broadcasted live at Freies Radio Kassel. With some insight info on the label in German and English, covering tracks by Varia, Gottfried ist tot and Nagra.
info_pt: Transmissão especial sobre a Enough Records no programa de radio frei², transmitido pela Freies Radio Kassel. Com alguma informação sobre a editora em alemão e inglês, e com temas de Varia, Gottfried ist tot e Nagra.

info_en:
Lemurs are strepsirrhine primates endemic to the island of Madagascar. Fossil records suggest that lemurs reached the shores of Madagascar by crossing the ocean in vegetation rafts. While their ancestors competed with monkeys and other primates in continental Africa, lemurs were able to evolve free from competition. This allowed them to differentiate from other species. The word lemur derives from the Latin lemures, which means "night spirit" or "ghost" and was probably coined due to the fact that these are nocturnal animals.

Lisbon-based Lemur was a "ragingly instrumental rock band", active between 2003 and 2006 and since hibernated. During that brief period of time they played about fifteen shows, sharing the stage with bands like Brainwashed by Amália, Katabatic, Bypass, Ölga, The Allstar Project, Frango and Puget Sound. They self-released a demo CD and later released an eponymous EP through the Merzbau netlabel. They also contributed to compilations such as "Animal Repetitivo", from the 2005 Out.Fest, an "exploratory music" festival which included Lemur in its first two editions, and "Can Take You Anywhere You Want", a release featuring Bor Land acts. Lemur went on to record exclusively for Borland three songs that have remained unreleased until this day.

Lemur's long slumber is now over: they are digitally releasing all their recordings, including previously unavailable tracks, in a joint effort between Enough Records and Associação Terapêutica do Ruído. The songs will be available for download at no cost. Lemur will also return to the stage (16 November 2013) to celebrate the 10 years of Sonic Fest, the festival they created with Brainwashed by Amália and where they played their first gig in July 2003.
info_pt:
Os lémures são primatas estrepsirrinos endémicos da Ilha de Madagáscar. Indícios fósseis indicam que atravessaram o mar após Madagáscar se ter separado de África. Enquanto os seus antepassados competiam com macacos e outros primatas, os lémures estavam a salvo, sem qualquer tipo de competição e por isso diferenciaram-se. A palavra lémure deriva do latim e significa "espírito da noite" ou "fantasma" e deve-se provavelmente ao facto de estas criaturas serem noctívagas.

Os Lemur de Lisboa eram uma banda de "rock furiosamente instrumental" que esteve activa entre 2003 e 2006 e que desde aí tem estado em hibernação. Nesse breve período de tempo deram uma quinzena de concertos, partilhando o palco com bandas como: Brainwashed by Amália, Katabatic, Bypass, Ölga, The Allstar Project, Frango e Puget Sound; editaram uma maqueta em edição de autor e um EP homónimo pela netlabel Merzbau e colaboraram em algumas compilações como a "Animal Repetitivo" do Out.Fest de 2005, festival em que participaram nas duas primeiras edições e a "Can Take You Anywhere You Want" da Bor Land, editora para a qual chegaram a gravar algumas faixas que permaneceram inéditas até hoje.

Despertam agora da sua longa catáfora não só para reeditarem em formato digital e gratuito a sua discografia completa, incluindo alguns inéditos, numa parceria entre a netlabel Enough Records e a Associação Terapêutica do Ruído, mas também para celebrarem os 10 anos do Sonic Fest, (16 Novembro 2013) festival que organizaram em conjunto com os Brainwashed by Amália e onde se estrearam ao vivo em Julho de 2003.

info_en: Our friends from the German [Esc.] Laboratory return with an album of live recordings from 2010 by their project [interrupt:Jumper].
info_pt: O colectivo alemão [Esc.] Laboratory regressa às edições na Enough com um album de gravações ao vivo do seu projecto [interrupt:Jumper], originalmente gravadas em 2010.

info_en: Drone ambient and field recordings release by Russian project North Hive. Artwork made from satellite images of the Yellowstone National Park, Caldera.
info_pt: Edição de sonoridades drone ambientais com gravações de campo pelas mãos do projecto Russo North Hive. Grafismo imagens de satélite do Yellowstone National Park, Caldera.

info_en: Schizoid triphop? Dubstep? Robotic afrostep? Experimental electronics? We don't know what to call this album from Chtin Mara, an alter ego of previous Enough Records release artist Mons Jacet. But it's well worth the listen if you're looking for something sick downtempo.
info_pt: Triphop esquizofrénico? Dubstep? Afrostep robótico? Electrónica experimental? Não sabemos muito bem como caracterizar este album de Chtin Mara, um alter ego do Lituano Martinas Rakshitnas que editou previamente na Enough como Mons Jacet. Qualquer que seja o rótulo, esta edição vale bem a pena ouvir para quem anda à procura de algo mais doente e lentinho.

info_en: Special mixtape by Amitron_7 using tracks from the Enough Records catalogue amongst a few exclusive tracks of his own and random sampling material. Artwork by ps as a derivative artwork by Hélder Costa. Stay tuned for Amitron_7's double album "Come Ye Sinners to the Gospel Feast" scheduled for release on the 8th of January 2014.
info_pt: Mixtape criada por Amitron_7 utilizando temas do catálogo da Enough Records, incluindo também alguns temas exclusivos da sua própria autoria e várias samples de televisão e cinema. Grafismo por ps derivado de um trabalho de Hélder Costa. Estejam atentos à edição dupla de Amitron_7 "Come Ye Sinners to the Gospel Feast" agendado para dia 8 de Janeiro de 2014.

info_en: Indie pop single by Russian project The Cosmic Setter with special guest appearance by Make Like A Tree.
info_pt: Single de Indie pop do projecto Russo The Cosmic Setter com participação especial Make Like A Tree.

info_en: 10 years after it was originally produced and released by the author as a limited edition cdr. Now remastered and available free for download as digital release. Electronic ambient / chill out album with trance influences by Portuguese project Frame.
info_pt: 10 anos após ter sido originalmente produzido e editado em edição de autor de cópias limitadas. Agora remasterizado e disponivel para download gratuito como edição digital. Album de electronica ambiental / chill out com influências de trance do projecto Português Frame.

album: Come Ye Sinners to the Gospel Feast
info_en:
Double album of psychedelic electronic ambient by English project Amitron_7. Artwork by Hélder Costa.

Two scientists meet up in 1970's Paris to conduct a series of experiments involving Theta Waves and surgical procedures on the human brain. They make a breakthrough and are able to link their minds and communicate and share their memories via a telepathic link. However their own are not the only voices they hear. Are they talking to the dead, to God or is there something else trying to come through?
info_pt:
Album duplo de electrónica ambiental psicadélica pelas mãos do projecto inglês Amitron_7. Grafismo por Hélder Costa.

Dois cientistas encontram-se na década de 1970 em Paris para conduzir uma série de experiências envolvendo ondas Theta e operações no cérebro humano. Eles conseguem um avanço na àrea que lhes permite unir as suas mentes, partilhar memórias e comunicar telepáticamente. No entanto as suas vozes não são as únicas que eles conseguem ouvir, estarão a comunicar com os mortos, com Deus ou haverá algo mais a tentar estabelecer contacto?

info_en: Album of analogue electronic music by Portuguese project Sci Fi Industries. Originally recorded in 2012. A co-release with Thisco Records.
info_pt: Album de electrónica analógica pelas mãos do projecto Português Sci Fi Industries. Originally recorded in 2012. A co-release with Thisco Records.

info_en: Experimental ambient soundscapes by Portuguese project Aires mixing field recordings and shoegaze influences.
info_pt: O projecto Aires é o culminar de vários anos de exploração sonora na electrónica experimental. O disco homónimo é o primeiro lançamento desta persona, e é um album que alia os interesses do músico pelo field recordings, drone, noise e samplagem.

album: Brother Sing, Sister Shout (And Other Conspiracies)
info_en: Album of gothic rock sounds with some heavy psychedelic and experimental noise influences. Signaling the return to the releases of Canadian project The Silence Industry.
info_pt: Album of rock gótico com fortes influências psicadélicas e de noise experimental. Assinalando o retorno às edições na Enough do projecto Canadiano The Silence Industry.

info_en: Dubstep / neurostep EP by Portuguese project Dyman.
info_pt: EP de dubstep / neurostep pelas mãos do projecto Português Dyman.

info_en: Synthwave EP by Brazilian project living in Portugal Herr Doktor. Synths and pads smelling like the future of the 90s.
info_pt: EP de synthwave pelas mãos do projecto Brasileiro radicado em Portugal Herr Doktor.

info_en: Detritus is an industrial metal EP by Portuguese project Waste Disposal Machine. Signalling their comeback after 2 years in the studio. This EP is released on same date as their new album Debris, available through our friend label Thisco [Thisk.74]. This EP contains two tracks of the Debris album itself, along with previously unreleased remixes by TatsuMaki and Torsion, and a remix by Waste Disposal Machine for Mikroben Krieg's Final Cut album (also available on Thisco). Artwork by André Coelho as derivative work of photography by Miguel Silva.
info_pt: Detritus é um EP de metal industrial da autoria da banda Portuguesa Waste Disposal Machine. Assinalando o regresso às edições após 2 anos no estúdio, este EP é editado no mesmo dia do segundo album de originais da banda entitulado Debris e que se encontra disponivel através da Thisco [Thisk.74]. Este EP contém dois temas do album, remisturas do tema 'I Sing the Body Electric' por TatsuMaki e Torsion, e uma remistura de Waste Disposal Machine para o album de 2010 de Mikroben Krieg entitulado "Final Cut" (também disponivel pela Thisco). Grafismo por André Coelho como trabalho derivativo de fotografias de Miguel Silva.

info_en: Celestial ambient drone sounds mixed with field recordings. From Russia with love.
info_pt: Sonoridades de ambient drone celestial misturadas com field recordings. Vindo da Russia.

info_en: Album by Janne Nummela with experimental jazz / contemporary classical sounds composed out of a manipulated virtual piano.
info_pt: Album de Janne Nummela de sonoridades jazz experimental e música clássica contemporânea, produzida com sons de um piano manipulado virtual.

info_en: 4 track EP of electronic sounds by Walt Thisney. An unknown author living somewhere in Lisbon, mastering the art of media and pop culture subversion in the twenty first century. Here with a concept album released under our Anonymous Archives sublabel, probably hinting at the social issues behind the financial empire and the state of mass consumption. Who knows really? It all sounds a little funky!
info_pt: EP de 4 temas de electrónica do projecto Walt Thisney, um autor desconhecido, provavelmente habitando em Lisboa, que anda por ai a treinar a arte de subversão da cultura pop para gerar critica social. Esta edição pertence à nossa sub-label Anonymous Archives, e provavelmente é uma reflexão existencial sobre os problemas inerentes ao capitalismo exacerbado, estado de consumo e império financeiro que governam a sociedade social. Ou algo nessas linhas. A música é fixolas.

info_en: Tripstep jazz album by Lithuanian project Marrach, cousin of another of our release artists Chtin Mara.
info_pt: Album de tripstep pelas mãos do projecto Lituano Marrach, primo de um outro nosso artista Chtin Mara.

info_en: We found glitch ambient Norwegian project Seazo by hearing his work on a demo by Cocoon. Loved the track, got in touch, and he was happy to send us this amazing new album titled "A Tribute To Cosmos" for release through Enough Records. Cover artwork is courtesy of Andreas S.
info_pt: Descobrimos o trabalho deste projecto Norueguês Seazo através da demoscene, na banda sonora de uma demo dos Cocoon. Como adoramos o tema, entramos em contacto com o projecto que se disponibilizou a editar o seu novo album "A Tribute To Cosmos" através da Enough Records. Grafismo cortesia de Andreas S.

info_en: Industrial ambient album by project [amt_23], belonging to the German collective [Esc.] Laboratory.
info_pt: Album de música ambiente industrial pelas mãos do projecto [amt_23] pertencente ao colectivo Alemão [Esc.] Laboratory.

info_en: Heavily recommended by Enough Records artist M-PeX, here is a full album of electronic fusion sounds by Portuguese project Jazzafari. It mixes electronic, hiphop, jazz and world music sounds together into a string of soulful beats, breaks and tracks. Perfect soundtrack for chilling in your lounge during these lazy summer days. Co-release with Toma Lá Records.
info_pt: Fortemente recomendado por M-PeX, editamos um album do projecto Português Jazzafari, que aqui mistura sonoridades da electrónica, hip hop e jazz num album de fusão que cria a perfeita atmosfera para estas pachorrentas tardes de verão. Uma co-edição com a Toma Lá Records.

info_en: Portuguese project Azureflux delivers us some mean sounding 8bit tracks on this debut EP of his. Artwork by iloveui.
info_pt: Estreia nas edições do projecto Português Azureflux, com um EP de sonoridades 8bits compostas com gameboy. Grafismo por iloveui

info_en: New album by Portuguese project Dyman. This time in a more death rock and nu-metal vein. Artwork by Rafaela Silva.
info_pt: Novo album do projecto Português Dyman, desta vez com um registo mais dark e pesado com influências do death rock e nu-metal. Grafismo de Rafaela Silva.

info_en: Industrial ambient EP from [Esc.] Laboratory's treasure trove of unreleased back catalogue. This one dates back to 2010 and is released under their moniker [Yahuy-Che-Kabah].
info_pt: EP de industrial ambient pelos suspeitos do colectivo Germânico [Esc.] Laboratory. Uma edição originalmente gravada em 2010 assinada com o pseudónimo [Yahuy-Che-Kabah].

artist: Aires / Rui P. Andrade / Earthly Beasts
info_en: Split album of experimental dark ambient by Portuguese projects Aires, Rui P. Andrade and Earthly Beasts. Artwork by Mafalda Melim.
info_pt: Split de ambiências dark com temas de 3 projectos Portugueses: Aires, Rui P. Andrade e Earthly Beasts. Grafismo de Mafalda Melim.

info_en: Split mixtape album of DJ Wook and Sci Fi Industries in similar electronica style. This is co-released with Thisco Records, they have limited edition tapes available! Cover photo by Lesley Young.
info_pt: Edição a meias de DJ Wook e Sci Fi Industries de música electrónica. Co-edição com a Thisco Records, eles tem uma edição física de cassete disponivel! Foto de Lesley Young.

info_en: Bridging techno, idm and industrial electronic sounds, in 2010 several projects from the German collective [Esc.] Laboratory did a series of remixes for Projekt Klangform. This album is the result.
info_pt: Ligando o techno, idm e o industrial, em 2010 diversos projectos do colectivo Alemão [Esc.] Laboratory fizeram uma série de remisturas para Projekt Klangform. Este album é o resultado.

info_en: 8bit album by Portuguese project Azureflux. Artwork by iloveui.
info_pt: Album de 8bits pelas mãos do projecto Português Azureflux. Grafismo por iloveui.

info_en: Lush and laidback chillout EP of electronic sounds by South African project Anima featuring a collaboration track with our Portuguese artist M-PeX.
info_pt: EP de electronica chill-out pelas mãos do projecto Sul Africano Anima. Inclui uma colaboração com o nosso projecto Português M-PeX.

album: Super Power Plant - Dystropic Ambienotix RMXs
info_en: Remix album of Super Power Plant by [Esc.] Laboratory's [Yahuy-Che-Kabah] project. Industrial ambient.
info_pt: Album de remisturas do projecto Super Power Plant assinado por [Yahuy-Che-Kabah], mais um dos vários projectos do colectivo alemão [Esc.] Laboratory. Sonoridades ambientais e industriais.

info_en: Enough Records is proud to present their 6th Easton Ellises release called Nightwavs. Fruit of a twelve month effort, Nightwavs is the Montreal band’s latest studio EP. Many songs were written in but only a select few made the cut. On the record you will find a refreshing sound that goes from rock with 80s synthesizers a la Duran Duran, to disco with "funky" guitars a la Nile Rodgers, which is reminiscent of the recent Daft Punk success "Get Lucky". You can find creative commons samples of their songs available on ccmixter. There is also a video produced under a Creative Commons license for the 3rd song on the EP entitled Falcon 69.
info_pt: A Enough Records apresenta a sua 6a edição dos The Easton Ellises entitulada Nightwavs. Após 12 meses de esforço, esta nova edição é o mais recente EP gravado em estúdio da banda Canadiana. Com sonoridades que vão desde o rock com sintetizadores dos anos 80 à la Duran Duran, ao disco com guitarras "funky" a la Nile Rodgers, reminescente do recente sucesso dos Daft Punk "Get Lucky". Os samples das músicas dos The Easton Ellies encontram-se disponiveis para remisturas no ccmixter. Está também disponivel um video do terceiro tema do EP: Falcon 69.

info_en: Latest album by M-PeX, his 5th on Enough Records is a double album. It draws it's inspirations from two odysseys: Homero's and Kubrik's. The first cd, sub-titled "Prologus" is entirely acoustic, with M-PeX on the Portuguese guitar and André Coelho on double bass. The second cd is titled "Epilogus", adding electronic elements to the sounds and featuring additional guest artist DJ X-Acto providing some additional electronics and scratch sounds. Artwork by Marco Madruga.
info_pt: Mais recente album de M-PeX, o seu quinto lançado pela Enough é um album duplo. Inspirado em duas odisseias, a de Homero e a de Kubrik. A primeira parte entitula-se "Prologus" e consiste em 6 temas completamente acústicos, com M-PeX na guitarra portuguesa e André Coelho no contra-baixo. A segunda parte entitula-se "Epilogus" e acrescenta elementos electrónicos com a colaboração do artista convidado DJ X-Acto. Grafismo de Marco Madruga.

info_en: Trilogy closure album by our Lithuanian tripstep artist Chtin Mara. Sickness drop overture.
info_pt: Album de encerramento da trilogia de edições de tripstep do projecto Lituano Chtin Mara.

info_en: This album release is from our Moldovian artist Marcel Gherman under his artist name Megatone, 15 tracks of classical piano recorded live. Soundtrack for lazy autumn afternoons or long winter nights. Cover photograph by Eunbyul Sabrina Lee.
info_pt: Edição do nosso artista Moldoviano Marcel Gherman sob o seu pseudónimo Megatone, 15 temas de piano clássico gravadas ao vivo. Música de fundo para tardes de outono ou longas noites de inverno. Fotografia por Eunbyul Sabrina Lee.

info_en: 8bit EP by Portuguese project Azureflux. Artwork by iloveui.
info_pt: EP de 8bits pelas mãos do projecto Português Azureflux. Grafismo por iloveui.

info_en: Massive anthology release by reknown Atari chiptune artist 505, collecting 37 of his best tracks composed between 1996 and 2013. Best consumed in shuffle mode! Also available is the extended version (with 107 tracks) as a free for download musicdisk for the Atari itself.
info_pt: Antologia massiva de temas de chiptune produzidas num Atari entre 1996 e 2013 pelo artista Alemão 505. Melhor consumida em modo aleatório! Também está disponivel como musicdisk para o Atari uma versão extendida (com 107 temas).

info_en: Electronic album by Portuguese project Sci Fi Industries, bundling different remix and collaboration tracks he has worked on during the past few years. Featuring collaboration works with U.M.M., Xotox, shhh..., Mikroben Krieg, Broto Verbo, Himalayha, Sektor 304, Human Being, Yoshihiro Kikuchi, Abuka, Calhau and Waste Disposal Machine.
info_pt: Album de música electrónica pelas mãos do projecto Português Sci Fi Industries erradicado nos Estados Unidos. Desta feita com 10 temas de colaborações e remisturas feitas com diferentes projectos ao longo dos últimos anos. Inclui temas com U.M.M., Xotox, shhh..., Mikroben Krieg, Broto Verbo, Himalayha, Sektor 304, Human Being, Yoshihiro Kikuchi, Abuka, Calhau and Waste Disposal Machine.

info_en: 8 years after his initial debut on Enough Records, UK's project Wurlitztraction by Chris Reid returns with another full album of laidback electronic tracks. Originally produced in 2011.
info_pt: 8 anos após a sua estreia na Enough Records, o projecto do Reino Unido Wurlitztraction de Chris Reid regressa às edições com um novo album de música electrónica pós dubstep. Originalmente produzido em 2011.

info_en: 7 years after their original debut on Enough, Portuguese oldschool EBM project U.M.M. is back to the releases with a new EP including a bunch of remixes by friend projects Corrosion, Aktivehate, Sci-Fi Industries, Waste Disposal Machine, A.D.A.C. 8286 and Technomader.
info_pt: 7 anos após a sua estreia na Enough, o projecto Português de oldschool EBM U.M.M. está de volta às edições com um EP que inclui também remisturas de projectos amigos Corrosion, Aktivehate, Sci-Fi Industries, Waste Disposal Machine, A.D.A.C. 8286 e Technomader.

info_en: Fast Idio, the electronic project of Canada's Jesse Williams, returns to Enough after a 13 year hiatus, now with a new EP of IDM sounds and vocals giving it an indie electronic touch.
info_pt: Fast Idio, projecto de música electrónica do Canadiense Jesse Williams, regressa às edições na Enough Records depois de 13 anos de interregno com o seu novo EP de sonoridades IDM e algumas vocais que lhe dão um toque mais indie.

info_en: Marrach delivers us another full length of his jazzy tripstep sounds, this time around with the collaboration of H. Stewart bringing in some soothing vocals to the gritty psychotic soundscapes.
info_pt: Marrach retorna às edições na Enough com album de sons que misturam influências do jazz, triphop e dubstep num trabalho sujo e algo psicótico. Desta vez conta também com as vocais de H. Stewart em alguns dos temas, trazendo uma dimensão algo mais melancólica.

info_en: Live recording of dSCi, here wearing their hats of electronic live jam experimentalists. This particular session was recorded during a tribute session to their member João Capela who sadly passed away last year. Concert photos by Irene Fernández. Cover artwork photos by Inês Cabral.
info_pt: Gravação do concerto tributo a João Capela por parte dos dSCi, aqui com os seus chapéus de improvisadores experimentalistas da electrónica obscura. Fotos do concerto da autoria de Irene Fernández. Fotografia de capa da autoria de Inês Cabral.

info_en: Ambient album by North Hive, mixing drone sounds and field recordings in their characteristic laidback style. Co-released with GV sound, with a couple bonus tracks for the Enough Records release.
info_pt: Album de música ambient pelo projecto Russo North Hive, misturando sonoridades do drone e de field recordings no seu estilo caracteristico de electronica ambiental. Co-edição com GV sound, com um par de temas extra para esta edição na Enough Records.

info_en:
Mixtape release celebrating the netlabel day of July 14th, 2015. Mixed by ps.
Tracklist:
01) The Easton Ellises - Ersatz (D. Xela & Nomis Yor Summer Mix Radio Edit)
02) Amitron_7 – This Is My House
03) M-PeX – Lacrimae
04) 1in10/Varia - Shout Into The Air / Looking For My Heart
05) No Loli-gagging - Meanwhile In Japan
06) Fast Idio - Atmose
07) U.M.M. - Democracia (Prá Frentex Mix)
08) Copy Your Idols - These Weak Hands That Held You
09) The Easton Ellises - Falcon 69 (Azureflux Remix)
10) Rolemusic - Yellow Dust
info_pt:
Mixtape comemorativa do dia internacional das netlabels, 14 de Julho de 2105. Misturado por ps.
Tracklist:
01) The Easton Ellises - Ersatz (D. Xela & Nomis Yor Summer Mix Radio Edit)
02) Amitron_7 – This Is My House
03) M-PeX – Lacrimae
04) 1in10/Varia - Shout Into The Air / Looking For My Heart
05) No Loli-gagging - Meanwhile In Japan
06) Fast Idio - Atmose
07) U.M.M. - Democracia (Prá Frentex Mix)
08) Copy Your Idols - These Weak Hands That Held You
09) The Easton Ellises - Falcon 69 (Azureflux Remix)
10) Rolemusic - Yellow Dust

info_en: Electronic album by Portuguese project Sci Fi Industries. Artwork by Zden Hlinka.
info_pt: Album de electronica pelas mãos do projecto Português Sci Fi Industries. Grafismo de Zden Hlinka.

info_en: Chillstep album by South African project Anima.
info_pt: Album de chillstep pelas mãos do projecto Sul Africano Anima.

info_en: 8bit/16bit album by Portuguese project Azureflux. Including a few remix works for ogui, Dragão Inkomodo, Bit Shifter and Irisu Syndrome. Artwork by iloveui.
info_pt: Album de música 8bit/16bit pelas mãos do project Português Azureflux. Incluindo remisturas para ogui, Dragão Inkomodo, Bit Shifter e Irisu Syndrome. Artwork by iloveui.

info_en: Mashup album by Jari Pitkänen mixing nordic doom metal and ethereal celestial ambient into a 3 track EP. The first EP of a 2 part series closing Enough Records Anonymous Archives cycle.
info_pt: Album de mashup pelas mãos do Filandês Jari Pitkänen misturando o doom metal dos países nórdicos com ambiente celestial etéreo. A primeira de duas partes de uma série que fecha o ciclo das suas edições na nossa sub-editora Anonymous Archives.
